lead_paragraph: Big East Commissioner Mike Tranghese called Louisville Athletic Director Tom Jurich on Sunday, saying referees erred during a disputed punt return for a touchdown by UConn in a game the Huskies won, 21-17. Tranghese told Jurich the officials had made a “terrible” mistake. Tranghese took action against the referee who missed the fair catch signal, but wouldn’t elaborate on the penalty. “The bad part is I can’t change the call,” Tranghese said yesterday.
